content:
So @boats has proposed a design meeting lang-team#37 for a const generics MVP. I'm all in favor. I'm wondering if we want to use next week's slot (July 22) for this (instead of lang-team#25) or if we would rather schedule the meeting for July 29th.

One other question is whether it would be possible for @varkor, @lcnr, @eddyb or other "core const generics hackers" to attend.

The design meetings take place at 13:00 UTC-04:00 (i.e., 19:00 CEST).
I would be in favor of bumping the WF / type aliases issue, as long as you'll be available for when we do end up scheduling it.
trying out the new zulip time picker support..
I am interested and would have the time to attend on 2020-07-22T13:00:00-04:00

haha I was confused for a bit because it showed 20:00 which is what my local time would be for 19:00 CEST (as I am in EEST, one timezone east of CEST), but you need to hover to see that it's automatically adjusted for the timezone of the reader
sounds plausible for me but my audio setup isn't great, I could listen in though
I should be able to attend then.
